column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////the ramen was superb! it was my first time to try Japanese ramen
column2: so it was very special to me as my first experience
column3: and overall the taste and visual met up to my expectations. Staffs were very friendly
column4: and the takoyaki was delicious. I give y'all guys an Oishi for your ramen. I would definitely come again.
